summary: REQ-3 and REQ-4 (client/partner registration submission to saveCallerUserProfile with role + isActive:false and submitted=true) appear implemented. SuperadminDashboard includes pendingUsers filtering, formatPrincipal truncation for display, handleCopy copying full text, and handleToggleStatus activating via setUserActiveStatus(..., true) then fetchUsers(). However, the diff is truncated before the Superadmin table/footer markup, and the workspace button navigation does not match the exact navigate("/path") acceptance criteria. There is also evidence (from frontend-file-summaries.txt) of unrequested routing/UI changes and toast/toaster additions that violate constraints/non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the entire Status User table section in SuperadminDashboard with the user-provided markup (including No column, Pending badge always, Copy Principal button copying full principal, and Aktifkan button calling handleToggleStatus(user)).
missing_requirements.reason: While helper functions (formatPrincipal/handleCopy), pendingUsers filtering, and handleToggleStatus exist, the actual table markup/columns (No column, Pending badge text, Aktifkan label, Copy Principal button in the table) is not shown in the provided diff due to truncation, so implementation of the required replacement table cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Workspace button must navigate via navigate("/client/dashboard") and navigate("/partner/dashboard") on click, with no auto-redirect logic.
missing_requirements.reason: The workspace buttons navigate using TanStack Router object form navigate({ to: "/client/dashboard" }) / navigate({ to: "/partner/dashboard" }), which does not match the acceptance criteriaâ€™s explicit navigate("/...") call signature.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update SuperadminDashboard footer text to exactly: "PT. Asistenku Digital Indonesia. Semua Hak dilindungi."
missing_requirements.reason: The SuperadminDashboard diff is truncated before any footer rendering, so the exact footer text change cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Routing changes / new routes added in frontend/src/App.tsx (e.g., /manajer/dashboard, /client/dashboard, /partner/dashboard).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids routing changes (no modifications to frontend/src/App.tsx route definitions and no path changes).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (states App.tsx has newly added routes)

hallucinated_features.description: Toast notifications / Sonner Toaster added in frontend/src/main.tsx.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal explicitly says not to add toast notifications or additional UI states not requested.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (states main.tsx mounts with Sonner Toaster)

hallucinated_features.description: Large landing page/UI refactors and content additions (LandingPage, Header, Hero, LayananSection, layananCopy, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints say no additional features or refactors; only merge specified activation/registration/login/footer logic.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (multiple components described as updated/added behavior)

hallucinated_features.description: Internal login/register behavioral changes (role/status validation, dropdown filtering changes, warnings).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also non-goals mention not changing internal role dropdown filtering/internal registration beyond what is required.

hallucinated_features.description: Client dashboard page added/changed with extensive static UI and tabs.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in BuildRequest; violates 'no additional features' constraint.
